title: Being able to chat ping your ping?
body:
I wouldn't say this is a huge thought but really.... there are times where you are actually lagging and it'd be nice to be able to ping your ping. Like you would for gold, abilities ready and items etc.

Chat would read "3000 ms" and everyone on YOUR team will see it (other team doesn't give two {{champion:17}} 's about your internet)

Other players that I've talked to think it would be a good feature.

Thanks for  reading, noobs

replies.body: Hmm, might be pretty straight forward. I'll have a talk with the engineer's who's been putting out all the ping stuff recently, see if it's something we can add in.

I think this would be a nice addition, there are multiple use cases:

* ADC is lagging and want to play passively while it last, ping his ping so the support can understand
* Top just died "stupidly" for the 3rd time, pinging his ping could help prevent the team-mates flaming him and understand the situation
* etc.
Any further developments on this? Any chance it's on its way to PBE yet? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Yes it's on the PBE right now. I expect it'll be on live with the preseason patch.
YESSSS FINALLLY WE'VE BEEN ASKING THIS FOR MONTHS AND IT'S BEEN ON THE FRONTPAGE MULTIPLE TIMES ;-;
